compat-change.description: Allow apps holding {@link android.Manifest.permission#MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE} permission to request raw external storage access.
compat-change.name: ENABLE_RAW_MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE_ACCESS

compat-change.description: Allow apps holding {@link android.app.role}#SYSTEM_GALLERY role to request raw external storage access.
compat-change.name: ENABLE_RAW_SYSTEM_GALLERY_ACCESS
